issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When running several (in my case several hundred) cloudwatch alarms that have the same autoscaling action trigger, I have seen the following in the log:

2015-09-23 12:52:08 ERROR | com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.metadata.AutoScalingMetadataException: Error updating auto scaling group 'my-auto-group' for arn:aws:euare::000940644858:
com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.metadata.AutoScalingMetadataException: Error updating auto scaling group 'my-auto-group' for arn:aws:euare::000940644858:

fields.summary: concurrent autoscaling action can cause errors
